body.raw:
> Then prove we now with best endeavour, > What from our efforts yet may spring; > He justly is despised who never > Did thought to aid his labours bring; > For this is Art’s true indication, > When skill is minister to thought, > When types that are the mind’s creation — > The hand to perfect form has wrought.
— Family verse, adapted
